00057 // InstantSynMech definition
00058 // ???
00060 
00061 class InstantSynMech
00062         : public SynMechInterface
00063 {
00064     template <class SynData, class SynMech, class PlastMech, class TypeBase> friend class SynapseTemplate;
00065     friend class InstantIFMech;
00066 public:
00067     explicit InstantSynMech(ConfigBase * const cfg);
00068     ~InstantSynMech() {
00069         delete[] alphajump_;
00070     }
00071 protected:
00072     void send_updated_states(double & current) {
00073         throw Error("InstantSynMech: should not be used");
00074     }
00075     void send_updated_states(double & conductance, double & current);
00076     void on_preneuron_fire_update(const Time & tspike, const double & synweight);
00077 private:
00078     void perform_calculations();
00079     const InstantSynMechConfig * const ismcfg_;
00080     /*add the array alpha_, nextjump_, etc.*/
00081     double conductance_, current_;
00082     double * alphajump_;
00083     Size nextjump_; //
00084 };

00089 // inline definitions
00091 
00093 // constructor
00094 inline InstantSynMech::InstantSynMech(ConfigBase * const configurator)
00095         : ismcfg_(dynamic_cast<InstantSynMechConfig *>(configurator))
00096         , current_(0.)
00097         , conductance_(0.)
00098         , nextjump_(0)
00099 {
00100     if (! ismcfg_) throw ConfigError("InstantSynMech: void configurator");
00101 
00102     alphajump_ = new double [ SimEnv::i_max_delay()];
00103     for (Size i = 0; i < SimEnv::i_max_delay(); ++i)
00104         alphajump_[i] = 0.0;
00105 }
00106 
00108 // update when the presynaptic neuron fires
00109 inline void InstantSynMech::on_preneuron_fire_update(const Time & time_lag_to_spike, const double & synweight)
00110 {
00111     Size spot = nextjump_ + (Size) ceil(time_lag_to_spike / SimEnv::timestep());
00112     if (spot >= SimEnv::i_max_delay()) spot -= SimEnv::i_max_delay();
00113     alphajump_[spot] += synweight;
00114 }
00115 
00117 // send the updated states (current and conductance) to the neuron activation mechanism
00118 // to send states to IF mechanism
00119 inline void InstantSynMech::send_updated_states(double & conductance, double & current)
00120 {
00121     perform_calculations();
00122     current += current_;
00123     conductance += conductance_;
00124 }
00125 
00127 // update when the presynaptic neuron fires
00128 inline void InstantSynMech::perform_calculations()
00129 {
00130     ++nextjump_;
00131     if (nextjump_ == SimEnv::i_max_delay()) nextjump_ = 0;
00132 
00133     // prepare the results of the computation to the Synapse object
00134     // note the inclusion of background input:
00135     conductance_ = alphajump_[nextjump_] + ismcfg_->poisson_increment();
00136 
00137     current_ = conductance_ * ismcfg_->Vreversal();
00138 
00139     alphajump_ [nextjump_] = 0.0;
00140 }
